---
title: "Modification Indices"
author: "Deon de Bruin"
---

```{r}
library(lavaan)
library(psychTools)
mod3 <- '
Neuroticism   =~ N1 + N2 + N3 + N4 + N5
Agreeableness =~ A1 + A2 + A3 + A4 + A5
'

fit.mod3 <- cfa(model = mod3, 
                data  = bfi)

summary(fit.mod3, 
        standardized = TRUE, 
        fit.measures = TRUE)

modificationindices(fit.mod3)
```
